template.description: This template is a collection of guides used for a product, persona, or activity.
template.title: Category

template.description: Guide pages are the primary place for organizing topic, how-to, and reference articles specific to this Category.
template.title: Guide

template.description: Answers a specific question about how something works or how to solve a specific problem.
template.title: How-To

template.description: Used to explain functions, definitions, or settings about a feature in the product.
template.title: Reference

template.description: This is a subcategory within a guide, similar to a chapter of a book.
template.title: Topic
